sections.name: Who are you? What is this for?
paragraphs: Hey, my name is Aiden Shi and I'm a high schooler with an intrest in programming. I've been programming since I was 7 (If you count html as a language and not markup).
This website is for all my thoughts, from education to programming. All thoughts are my own.

sections.name: What is this website built with?
paragraphs: This website is purely built with html and css. No trackers, no cookies stored. The website does use a bit of templating, but thats just used to make creating new articles easier, you can find all the source code here. The color scheme comes from Nord. Fonts are DM Mono for the headings and Roboto Mono for text.
